name: MAMA KONG
description:
Help ahboy grab the items he needs to complete his chores, avoid his snitch neighbour, the snitch neighbour's son's beyblades, and their ill-trained dogs! Clear the now perilous HDB before mummy catches him! And reminisce your childhood while you're at it! If you want!

Controls: WASD movement, SPACE to jump, S to hide behind bushes! R to restart

all SFX sourced from freesounds.org
